schema.name: Michel Murabito
schema.description: I am a Developer Advocate at Mia-Platform and a proud member of the CNCF TAG Environmental Sustainability. This page showcases the events, videos, and podcasts I have participated in over time.

data.pageTitle: Speaking Engagements: Events, Videos and Podcasts
data.pageDescription: Explore a comprehensive collection of events, videos, and podcasts where I have shared my knowledge and insights. Dive into my speaking engagements and discover the topics I am passionate about.
